concept.title: 225.401-71 PRODUCTS OR SERVICES IN SUPPORT OF OPERATIONS IN AFGHANISTAN.

conbody.p: When acquiring products or services, other than small arms, in support of operations in
Afghanistan if using a procedure specified in 225.7703-1(a) (2) or (3), the procedures of subpart 25.4 are not applicable.
